page.title: 17 Castle Museum (Two).
page.content:
The Museum houses a fine {collection} of coins. Children enjoy the Haunted Room best and the story of Robert de Marmion being hit across the face by an angry nun with a shepherd's crook. On the top of the Norman tower is the flagpole where local and national flags are flown. By the entrance is a small shop. Prices include:
Key Rings....70p Badges.......40p Post Cards...10p Pencils......15p Book Marks...40p Note Books...35p
A lot of {restoration} work is being undertaken replacing stonework and window surrounds. In the courtyard there are entrances to the old dungeons and coal cellars. Some of the windows are over three hundred years old.
